name: laying with the dead on broken concrete
name_original: laying with the dead on broken concrete
description:
update: added a few lines.

a short kinetic visual novel made in about 7 hours. you are a fallen angel, recalling the memories you have of the dead girl whose form you have taken. 3.1k words.

there's going to be mistakes in art/script/etc. it looks like shit for a reason!  it's a low effort game. 

warning: this game does discuss some heavy elements, including suicide and religious trauma. the religion here is only loosely based on christianity/using its terminology but with my own elements.  

this character was originally going to be for my main murdersim (what the last revenge line alludes to), but i couldn't flesh out her feelings without sounding repetitive in that setting. so, for now, her backstory is interwoven into this game. there are some little anecdotes from my own life here and there.
